meanings.definition: A plant of the ginger family, with brightly colored flowers and aromatic rhizomes.
meanings.sent1: The curcuma plant in the garden has beautiful flowers.
meanings.sent2: I saw a curcuma plant with red flowers at the botanical garden.
meanings.sent3: The curious cat played hide-and-seek among the curcuma plants.
meanings.sent4: Her smile bloomed like a curcuma flower in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The scent of the curcuma plant lingered in the air, sweet and spicy.

meanings.definition: A yellow pigment obtained from the rhizome of the turmeric plant, used as a coloring agent and in traditional medicine.
meanings.sent1: The chef added curcuma to the curry for a vibrant color.
meanings.sent2: Curcuma is a common ingredient in many Asian dishes.
meanings.sent3: The artist accidentally spilled curcuma on the canvas, creating a yellow streak.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like a sprinkle of curcuma, brightening the room.
meanings.sent5: The sunset painted the sky with hues of curcuma, orange and gold blending together.
